note:
I'm a biophysicist by training interested in the pedagogy of music and biophysics. My current work involves managing a team of volunteer researchers investigating recreational therapy. We're transitioning into an interview phase so if you'd like to share your expertise please get in touch. I also run a pickup baseball charity that meets in Oakland by the Caldecott Tunnel every Sunday at noon to hit, throw, and catch baseballs for free.

Please add hashtags to my posts to increase visibility.
